name: hw5
description: [![Review Assignment Due Date](https://classroom.github.com/assets/deadline-readme-button-24ddc0f5d75046c5622901739e7c5dd533143b0c8e959d652212380cedb1ea36.svg)](https://classroom.github.com/a/CxYsPTEO) # SD500-Inheritance Create a class `PersistedStorage` which extends `MyStorage` class (from hw4) and persist all state changes to the hard drive. * When the class instantiate, read and set the state from the hard disk into memory * Every time the state changes you will have to update the persisted storage state back into the hard drive.
